title: Violet's Present
description: When Matt’s Great-great-aunt Violet dies, she leaves him a precious a photo album he loved as a child. Then Matt starts having dreams—very good dreams—about Joseph, one of the men in the pictures from the 1940s. One morning when Matt wakes up, the bruises are still there. Could there be more to Violet’s present than he thought?A story from the Dreamspinner Press 2012 Daily Dose package "Time Is Eternity".
author: Kim Fielding
